name: privacy-amm-circuits
description: ZK circuits for Privacy AMM on Solana

scripts.compile: npm run compile:swap && npm run compile:add && npm run compile:remove
scripts.setup:swap: snarkjs groth16 setup build/private_swap.r1cs build/pot14_final.ptau build/private_swap_0000.zkey && cp build/private_swap_0000.zkey build/private_swap.zkey
scripts.setup:add: snarkjs groth16 setup build/private_add_liquidity.r1cs build/pot14_final.ptau build/private_add_liquidity_0000.zkey && cp build/private_add_liquidity_0000.zkey build/private_add_liquidity.zkey
scripts.setup:remove: snarkjs groth16 setup build/private_remove_liquidity.r1cs build/pot14_final.ptau build/private_remove_liquidity_0000.zkey && cp build/private_remove_liquidity_0000.zkey build/private_remove_liquidity.zkey
scripts.setup: npm run setup:swap && npm run setup:add && npm run setup:remove
scripts.export-vkey:swap: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/private_swap.zkey build/verification_key.json
scripts.export-vkey:add: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/private_add_liquidity.zkey build/verification_key_add.json
scripts.export-vkey:remove: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/private_remove_liquidity.zkey build/verification_key_remove.json
scripts.export-vkey: npm run export-vkey:swap && npm run export-vkey:add && npm run export-vkey:remove
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run setup && npm run export-vkey
scripts.build:swap: npm run compile:swap && npm run setup:swap && npm run export-vkey:swap
scripts.build:add: npm run compile:add && npm run setup:add && npm run export-vkey:add
scripts.build:remove: npm run compile:remove && npm run setup:remove && npm run export-vkey:remove
scripts.prove: snarkjs groth16 prove build/private_swap.zkey witness.wtns proof.json public.json
scripts.verify: snarkjs groth16 verify build/verification_key.json public.json proof.json
